content.raw:
I checked your branch and most of it looks good, the only problem was that the tick position on the timeline didn't correspond to the time written on the right. I think that's because you got rid of the logic of having a `roundStartTime` different from the real start time. That's needed because the tick times don't display milliseconds. 

So I got ported the main ideas from your branch manually on 3c72a72, let me know if I forgot anything.
content.html:
I checked your branch and most of it looks good, the only problem was that the tick position on the timeline didn't correspond to the time written on the right. I think that's because you got rid of the logic of having a roundStartTime different from the real start time. That's needed because the tick times don't display milliseconds.

So I got ported the main ideas from your branch manually on 3c72a72, let me know if I forgot anything.
